thread.title: Parole absconder flees police in stolen car, jumps into frigid Saginaw River
thread.title_full: Parole absconder flees police in stolen car, jumps into frigid Saginaw River

author: Cole Waterman | cwaterma@mlive.com
title: Parole absconder flees police in stolen car, jumps into frigid Saginaw River
text: A 40-year-old man led police on a chase in a stolen car before jumping into the frigid waters of the Saginaw River in an ill-advised dash for freedom. His polar bear plunge didn't last long though, as he's currently in police custody.
